languages.text: "Не думал, что когда-нибудь услышу от проклятого Дитя подобную речь". {n}Навигатор медленно склоняет голову.{/n} "Дитя... нет, Леди Кассия. Если таково ваше решение, Дом Орселлио последует за вами. Пора покончить с темными днями в истории нашего Дома".

traits.locale_text: "Не думал, что когда-нибудь услышу от проклятого Дитя подобную речь". {n}Навигатор медленно склоняет голову.{/n} "Дитя... нет, Леди Кассия. Если такого ваше решение, Дом Орселлио последует за вами. Пора покончить с темными днями в истории нашего дома".
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "I never expected to hear such words from the mouth of the cursed Child." {n}The Navigator slowly bows his head.{/n} "Child... no, Lady Cassia. If such is your decision, House Orsellio will follow you. The time has come for us to do away with the dark pages of our House's history."
languages.original_text: "Не думал, что когда-нибудь услышу от проклятого Дитя подобную речь". {n}Навигатор медленно склоняет голову.{/n} "Дитя... нет, Леди Кассия. Если таково ваше решение, Дом Орселлио последует за вами. Пора покончить с темными днями в истории нашего Дома".

If such is your decision, House Orsellio will follow you. The time has come for us to do away with the dark pages of our House's history."

If such is your decision, House Orsellio will follow you. The time has come for us to do away with the dark pages of our House's history."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: 「そんな言葉が呪われし御子の口から出てくるとは思わなかった」{n}航宙士はゆっくりと頭を下げる。{/n}「御子…いえ、レディ・カシア。それがあなたの決定なら、オーセリオ家は従いましょう。オーセリオ家の暗黒史を終わらせる時が来たのですね」
languages.original_text: "I never expected to hear such words from the mouth of the cursed Child." {n}The Navigator slowly bows his head.{/n} "Child... no, Lady Cassia. If such is your decision, House Orsellio will follow you. The time has come for us to do away with the dark pages of our House's history."

traits.locale_text: 「そんな言葉が呪われし御子の口から出てくるとは思わなかった」{n}航宙士はゆっくりと頭を下げる。{/n}「御子…いえ、レディ・カシア。それがあなたの決定なら、オーセリオ家は従いましょう。オーセリオ家の暗黒史を終わらせる時が来たのですね」
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: “我从没想过，被诅咒的孩子居然会说出这样的话。”{n}导航者慢慢低下了头。{/n}“圣子……不，卡西娅女士，如果这就是你的决定，那整个奥赛罗家族都愿意追随你。是时候彻底摒弃我们家族历史上这黑暗的片段了。”
languages.original_text: "I never expected to hear such words from the mouth of the cursed Child." {n}The Navigator slowly bows his head.{/n} "Child... no, Lady Cassia. If such is your decision, House Orsellio will follow you. The time has come for us to do away with the dark pages of our House's history."

traits.locale_text: “我从没想过，被诅咒的孩子居然会说出这样的话。”{n}导航者慢慢低下了头。{/n}“圣子……不，卡西娅女士，如果这就是你的决定，那整个奥塞罗家族都愿意追随你。是时候彻底摒弃我们家族历史上这黑暗的片段了。”
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: « Je n'aurais jamais cru l'Enfant maudite capable d'un tel discours. » {n}Le navigateur incline lentement la tête.{/n} « Mon enf... Non, dame Cassia. Si telle est votre décision, alors la maison Orsellio l'accepte. L'heure est venue de tirer un trait définitif sur le sombre passé de notre maison. »
languages.original_text: "I never expected to hear such words from the mouth of the cursed Child." {n}The Navigator slowly bows his head.{/n} "Child... no, Lady Cassia. If such is your decision, House Orsellio will follow you. The time has come for us to do away with the dark pages of our House's history."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'aurais jamais cru l'enfant maudite capable d'un tel discours. » {n}Le navigateur incline lentement la tête.{/n} « Mon enf... Non, dame Cassia. Si telle est votre décision, alors la maison Orsellio l'accepte. L'heure est venue de tirer un trait définitif sur le sombre passé de notre maison. »
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: «Jamás habría esperado oír esas palabras de la boca de la niña maldita». {n}El Navegante agacha la cabeza con lentitud.{/n} «Niña... no, lady Cassia. Si esa es su decisión, la casa Orsellio la seguirá. Es la hora de dejar atrás las páginas negras de la historia de nuestra casa».
languages.original_text: "I never expected to hear such words from the mouth of the cursed Child." {n}The Navigator slowly bows his head.{/n} "Child... no, Lady Cassia. If such is your decision, House Orsellio will follow you. The time has come for us to do away with the dark pages of our House's history."

traits.locale_text: «Jamás habría esperado oír esas palabras de la boca de la niña maldita». {n}El Navegante agacha la cabeza con lentitud.{/n} «Niña... no, lady Cassia. Si esa es su decisión, la casa Orsellio la seguirá. Es la hora de dejar atrás las páginas negras de la historia de nuestra casa».
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Ich hätte nie erwartet, solche Worte einmal aus dem Mund des verfluchten Kinds zu hören." {n}Der Navigator neigt langsam den Kopf.{/n} "Kind ... nein, Lady Cassia. Wenn das Eure Entscheidung ist, wird das Haus Orsellio Euch folgen. Es ist an der Zeit, die dunklen Seiten der Geschichte unseres Hauses zu beseitigen."
languages.original_text: "I never expected to hear such words from the mouth of the cursed Child." {n}The Navigator slowly bows his head.{/n} "Child... no, Lady Cassia. If such is your decision, House Orsellio will follow you. The time has come for us to do away with the dark pages of our House's history."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte nie erwartet, solche Worte einmal aus dem Mund des verfluchten Kinds zu hören." {n}Der Navigator neigt langsam den Kopf.{/n} "Kind ... nein, Lady Cassia. Wenn das Eure Entscheidung ist, wird das Haus Orsellio Euch folgen. Es ist an der Zeit, die dunklen Seiten der Geschichte unseres Hauses zu beseitigen."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Lanetli Çocuk'un ağzından böyle sözler duymayı beklemiyordum." {n}Rotacı, başını hafifçe eğiyor.{/n} "Çocuk... Leydi Cassia... Madem kararınız bu yönde, Orsellio Hanesi peşinizden gidecek. Hanemizin tarihinden karanlık sayfaları temizleme vaktimiz geldi."
languages.original_text: "I never expected to hear such words from the mouth of the cursed Child." {n}The Navigator slowly bows his head.{/n} "Child... no, Lady Cassia. If such is your decision, House Orsellio will follow you. The time has come for us to do away with the dark pages of our House's history."

traits.locale_text: "Lanetli Çocuk'un ağzından hiç böyle sözler çıkmasını duymayı beklemiyordum." {n}Rotacı, başını hafifçe eğiyor.{/n} "Çocuk... Daha doğrusu, Leydi Cassia. Madem kararınız bu yönde, Orsellio Hanesi de peşinizden gidecek. Hanemizin tarihinin karanlık sayfalarını temizlememizin vakti geldi."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader
